info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 7 at 9:00PM CDT until May 8 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Fort Worth TX
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas...
South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall and Hunt Counties.
South Sulphur River Near Cooper affecting Hopkins and Delta Counties.
West Fork Trinity River Near Boyd affecting Wise County.
Trinity River Near Long Lake (Oakwood) affecting Freestone, Anderson and Leon Counties.
Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Navarro and Henderson Counties.
...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Texas...
Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County.
Navasota River Near Easterly affecting Robertson and Leon Counties.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Texas...
Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...South Fork Sabine River near Quinlan.
* WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 4.8 feet Monday evening.
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.water.noaa.gov/wfo/FWD.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON
